name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InPitch: Automate Connects & DMs for LinkedIn

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Safely automate lead generation with custom Connects & DMs for LinkedIn. Ideal for entrepreneurs, sales and recruiting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
â­ Generate qualified leads with InPitch â­

âš™ï¸ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Automate the heavy lifting and save your Linkedin prospecting time.

ğŸ¤–âš¡ Automated and Customizable Connects & DMs for Linkedin âš¡ğŸ¤–
This is a Chrome Extension that allows you to fully automate your LinkedIn prospecting tasks, while staying under the daily limits fixed by LinkedIn.
Sequence your actions according to specific delays and conditions, all in a completely automated way.
ProspectIn is safe and easy to use, all you need to do is launch the extension, set your message and prospect search, and watch it go!

â­ How it works:

âœ… Set your custom Connect message, with dynamic variables to adjust to the prospect's name/company/etc.

âœ… Select your Prospect search by pasting the LinkedIn People search link. The extension will use this link to send connects to people that appear in this Linkedin Search.

âœ… Input how many Connects you'd like to send, click "Start" and see the magic happen. Feel free to leave the computer working for you. 

ğŸ•µï¸ I've created this extenstion to help you and anyone, recruiter, marketer or entrepreneur, who wants to automate his or her LinkedIn activity to build their business, achieve their goals... to make it!ğŸ•µï¸

ğŸ¤— This is the first version released. If you find this extension useful, send me your feedback through the extension's "feedback" section and I would love to add more features you and other users request!
